ISSUE.TITLE: Port MariaDB support to Modeler
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** commit 674b577212c794f47b3976d7dfb8354ee54c0ff5 added support for MariaDB in org.flowable.common.engine.impl.AbstractEngineConfiguration.java. `databaseTypeMappings.setProperty("HSQL Database Engine", DATABASE_TYPE_HSQL); databaseTypeMappings.setProperty("MySQL", DATABASE_TYPE_MYSQL); databaseTypeMappings.setProperty("MariaDB", DATABASE_TYPE_MYSQL); databaseTypeMappings.setProperty("Oracle", DATABASE_TYPE_ORACLE);` This was not replicated in the code in Modeler. org.flowable.ui.modeler.conf.DatabaseConfiguration ` databaseTypeMappings.setProperty("HSQL Database Engine", DATABASE_TYPE_HSQL); databaseTypeMappings.setProperty("MySQL", DATABASE_TYPE_MYSQL); databaseTypeMappings.setProperty("Oracle", DATABASE_TYPE_ORACLE); ` **Expected behavior** It would be much appreciated if supported DBs were consistent across all flowable apps :-)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Use method injection for creating the IDM UserDetailsService
